alert.note: Alert for Appling (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Appling County through 845 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Surrency. This storm was nearly stationary and producing very heavy rainfall which may cause minor flooding. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Appling County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
